meanings.definition: To convert (a video or audio file) from one format to another.
meanings.sent1: She transcodes the video to make it compatible with different devices.
meanings.sent2: He often transcodes his music files to MP3 format for easier sharing.
meanings.sent3: The computer magician transcodes the video, turning it into a new spell.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in transcoding turns old files into digital gold.
meanings.sent5: The software transcodes the audio, like a language translator for music.

meanings.definition: The act or process of converting (a video or audio file) from one format to another.
meanings.sent1: The transcodes of the video were successful, and now it plays smoothly.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the transcodes required to make the file compatible with all devices.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with the hum of transcodes happening in the background.
meanings.sent4: The transcodes of the audio files were like a symphony of format changes.
meanings.sent5: The importance of transcodes became clear when the video played perfectly after conversion.
